snippet.title: MARE Release Trailer - Oculus Quest
snippet.description:
MARE is coming to Oculus Quest on January 7th, 2021.
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3726478607381266/

“For immediate release: MARE; after years in the works, we’re happy to announce that it will finally see the light of day coming exclusively for Oculus Quest on January 7th, 2021. MARE will deliver the full experience on both Oculus Quest 1 & 2, including 90Hz support for Oculus Quest 2; furthermore, MARE will be coming to Oculus Rift at a later date in the near future.”

About MARE:

As you wake up, stirred from a dreamless sleep with an unknown purpose, you find yourself in the strange lands of Mare embodying a mysterious artificial bird.

Crossing paths with a helpless companion you venture deep into unknown territory on a puzzling adventure while unraveling a mysterious narrative and the secrets hidden within. All in order to ensure the arrival of the companion at her impending destiny.

Features:

Explore the vast and strange landscapes by the means of an artificial bird.

Guide and protect a vulnerable AI companion on her unexpected adventure.

Let the curiosity of the companion inspire you to explore and discover the underlying narrative spanning over 8 chapters.

Immerse yourself in the ambient atmosphere and otherworldly music by space-musician Tony Gerber, for a soothing and relaxing experience.

Search for lost artifacts hidden throughout the world in order to unlock the final secret of Mare.

###

Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3726478607381266/

Full announcement: https://www.visiontrick.com/mare-release/

Follow Visiontrick Media on Twitter for day to day updates: https://twitter.com/TheVisiontrick

https://visiontrick.com
